summary: Build a premium, soft, dreamy romantic interactive microsite titled ‚ÄúHappy Rose Day, Jansi‚Äù with 7 pages, glassmorphism UI, smooth cinematic animations, floating CSS/SVG hearts, responsive layouts, and global user-initiated background music (cani.mp4). architectural_notes: Global audio must be user-initiated (no autoplay) and controlled via a persistent play/pause UI visible on all pages.
Background hearts/sparkles must be created with pure CSS/SVG (no emoji hearts, no external heart images).
All animations/transitions: gentle fades/slide-ups, smooth cinematic motion; hover effects are soft glow only; no bounce/shrink effects.
Audio asset to use is `cani.mp4` (not `cani.mp3`); keep the same user-initiated playback + persistent controls requirements.
known_issues: Audio playback is silent everywhere because the project was configured for `cani.mp3` but the provided file is `cani.mp4`.

Add global background effects across pages: floating heart shapes created using pure CSS/SVG (no emoji hearts, no external heart images) plus subtle low-opacity heart sparkles. Effects must be lightweight, not block content interaction, and remain responsive.

Implement global audio playback using the provided file `cani.mp3` with (1) a visible, elegant play/pause toggle available on all pages, and (2) a hard guarantee that audio never autoplays‚Äîplayback must start only after a user interaction (e.g., tapping a play button).
